definitions.definition: A road junction at which traffic streams circularly around a central island .
definitions.label_groups: chiefly UK , New Zealand , Ireland , Canada , Australia and sometimes US

definitions.definition: A horizontal wheel which rotates around a central axis when pushed and on which children ride, often found in parks as a children 's play apparatus .
A short, close-fitting coat or jacket worn by men or boys, especially in the 19th century.

main_definition: ( chiefly UK , New Zealand , Ireland , Canada , Australia and sometimes US ) A road junction at which traffic streams circularly around a central island .
secondary_definitions: ( chiefly British ) A horizontal wheel which rotates around a central axis when pushed and on which children ride, often found in parks as a children 's play apparatus .
A short, close-fitting coat or jacket worn by men or boys, especially in the 19th century.
